title: Verba
description: Verba is an authentic pocket dictionary which provides accurate and up-to-date word definitions. Compact, precise & reliable.

title: Periodic Table
description: Interactive Periodic Table of Elements app for Windows. Explore elements details, history and atomic structures in a user-friendly interface.

title: SendMe
description: SendMe, a platform that connects people who need tasks done with people who can do them. It's a simple, easy-to-use solution that makes it easy to find the person for the job.

title: LBSHS LMS
description: A comprehensive Library Management System which allows library administrators to manage the library resources with impecable ease.

title: QRGenie
description: QRGenie is a robust API for generating dynamic QR codes with ease. It is ideal for industries like marketing, payments and secure authentication.
